top_comments.comment: Your Kitten Can't Leave The Room. Can't Leave JK's Angelic Voice.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Guuuys I made a rock version of this cover! 🎸🎸 I’d appreciate it if you checked it out~~ I’d like y’all to join me in manifesting the rockstar ;);)

I came back to this video after watching How to Listen ... Adele.  Your comments here esp. about the chorus make so much more sense to me now!  I know I’m a broken record but THANK YOU for your analysis and explanations. 🙏
